channel.title: Comments on: LessThanDot Sponsors SQL Saturday in Chicago
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: So how about a recap? By the time I found out it was booked solid :(
item.content:encoded: So how about a recap? By the time I found out it was booked solid üôÅ

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: Sorry Eli, I will never do it again Eli. Please forgive me Eli. And PLEASE let me sleep.
item.content:encoded: Sorry Eli, I will never do it again Eli. Please forgive me Eli. And PLEASE let me sleep.

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description: Finishing getting packed for SQLSaturday, going to be a fun trip. And if Chris keeps it up we might be staying up until 3AM in August, I was too easy on him last year. And yeah, Janice, the About Us page was my fault - I'll have to take a look when I get back and see if I can de-linkify them (or even remember how to edit that page).
item.content:encoded: Finishing getting packed for SQLSaturday, going to be a fun trip. And if Chris keeps it up we might be staying up until 3AM in August, I was too easy on him last year. And yeah, Janice, the About Us page was my fault – I’ll have to take a look when I get back and see if I can de-linkify them (or even remember how to edit that page).

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: The about us page is Eli's work. SO if you go to Chicago you can tell him in person ;-).
item.content:encoded: The about us page is Eli’s work. SO if you go to Chicago you can tell him in person ;-).

item.title: By: Janice Lee
item.dc:creator: Janice Lee
item.content:encoded:
Whose idea then were the SSDs? üòâ Re the Deep Dives book, I actually just ordered a copy from Amazon a couple of days ago based on your recommendation. It was cheaper doing that than flying to Chicago and attending SQL Saturday. But you have Brent Ozar speaking! I’m a big fan! That would have made the trip sooo worth it–that and maybe winning an SSD üòõ

Good luck!

Btw, on your About Us page, in the Owning Founders section, the names are made to look like links but they aren’t. (How minute is that üòâ Just saying :P)

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Yeah, wonder who came up with it :P Smart guy!
item.content:encoded: Yeah, wonder who came up with it üòõ Smart guy!

item.title: By: SQLDenis

item.description: Those 30 Gb SSD drives are an excellent idea
item.content:encoded: Those 30 Gb SSD drives are an excellent idea
